name: Imagination Funtime Odyssey - DEMO - Elizabeth's turn...
name_original: Imagination Funtime Odyssey - DEMO - Elizabeth's turn...
description:
The same demo as before, but this version will test Elizabeth's moveset. She's lighter and can cover more upward distance., but in game, she will deal less damage plus some slippage... 

X = Attack

X+C = Boomerang

V = Dive

C = Run
